name: Pizza Crash
description:
Pizza Crash is a prototype racing-slash-juggling-pizzas game made with Unity.

  • WASD - Drive (tank controls)
  • Spacebar - Handbrake
  • B - Boost
  • R - Repulse enemies

Collect pizzas, deliver them, earn tips, buy upgrades! Watch out for competing hotdog vendors - those guys are jerks.
